answers.answer: I had preeclampsia last pregnancy and maybe this one as well(im currently layin in labor and delivery at 29wks.ugh)..i think the swelling they look for is in your arms legs hands feet face..that kind of thing ;)
Oh no do you have it! I hope your feeling okay :) oh that's okay so I was nearly panicking I didn't know whether it was from baby's head or it was swollen in general lol thank you :)
It's normal for it to swell :) unfortunately lol. It'll go away after awhile after birth!
That's perfectly fine so lol thanks ladies :)

question: Im 30+6 and I have high bp.. The doctor asked had I any swelling and I told him no... Bit down there (vagina) seems very swollen or could it just be the pressure from baby's head being down? Its been like this a few weeks and I'm so confused?
title: HELP! swollen down there????
